title: On the road again - logo
content:
Hi,  
could you help me to identify the font used for "On the Rod Again"  
Thx a lot

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112141im_/http:/typophile.com/files/OnTheRoadAgain_4788.jpg)

Font: 

 Sail 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112141/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: wonderfulgreg

comments.content: "On the Road" is **[Sail](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112141/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts&ffam=Sail%20-%20Regular&fid=1e223dc67192feeb24e1188315b1c7db&fsize=60&text=On%20the%20Road&wrap=2)** by LatinoType [2011, now part of Google Web Fonts]
